name: British Airways Trip Report: London Heathrow - Stockholm Arlanda: Airbus A320
description:

Date of Travel: 12 JULY 2017
Aircraft: Airbus A320
Tail: G-EUUJ
Livery: BA standard 
Route: LHR-ARN
Weather on Departure: Scattered clouds, winds 20kts
Weather on Arrival: Scattered clouds, winds calm 
Airborne Time: 2h21m
Miles: 738
Remarks: Positioning flight to start ex-ARN trip to the USA

Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

I have some AWESOME content to share with you guys. JetBlue Mint, Amtrak Empire Builder, another First Class video, a sweet SouthWest experience...and more. But while I make the finishing touches to those, join me as I travel to Stockholm in Sweden. Next week I'll be posting FLL-LAX with Jetblue's splendid value Mint business class. 

I travelled here to start my journey to the United States. Why? Low fares, of course (search "ex EU" on Flyertalk if you're still confused). This is just one of the last BA short hauls that will appear on my channel as I've booked upcoming travel with (drum roll) Star Alliance as my chosen alliance for 2018 and beyond. 

Do you have any ideas for future trip reports? Something you've never seen on YouTube before? Why not suggest it to me in the comments? I read every single one! üëçüèª

Enjoy the video, and thanks for watching. If you subscribe, then thanks for being part of the channel! 

BA FIRST CLASS TO HOUSTON: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=_O8FpAe-pD0
